Function Documentation

◆ CANTX_CellVoltages()

uint32_t CANTX_CellVoltages ( CAN_MESSAGE_PROPERTIES_s  message,
uint8_t *  pCanData,
uint8_t *  pMuxId,
const CAN_SHIM_s *const  kpkCanShim 
)

can tx callback function for cell voltages

Parameters
[in]messagecontains the message ID, DLC and endianness
[in]pCanDatapayload of can frame
[in]pMuxIdmultiplexer for multiplexed CAN messages
[in]kpkCanShimshim to the database entries

◆ CANTX_VoltageSetData()

static void CANTX_VoltageSetData ( uint8_t  muxId,
uint64_t *  pMessage,
CAN_SIGNAL_TYPE_s  cellVoltageSignal,
CAN_SIGNAL_TYPE_s  cellVoltageInvalidFlagSignal,
CAN_ENDIANNESS_e  endianness,
const CAN_SHIM_s *const  kpkCanShim 
)
static

Helper function for CANTX_CellVoltages()

Used in the CANTX_CellVoltages() callback to set invalid flag data and voltage data in the CAN frame.

Parameters
[in]muxIdmultiplexer value
[in]pMessagepointer to CAN frame data
[in]cellVoltageSignalsignal characteristics for voltage data
[in]cellVoltageInvalidFlagSignalsignal characteristics for invalid flag data
[in]endiannessbig or little endianness of data
[in]kpkCanShimshim to the database entries
